item.title: Beard code error? o:
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[code] if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code]

There’s my code in player.java. Here’s my error, sorry, not a great coder…:

Player.java:854: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
